remarks: One-to-one relationship for division.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divassd.4 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
div11d.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( A / C ) = ( B / C ) ) $.
div11d $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
